First Name

Email Address
Phone Number
Which best describes you?

options.label: Full Time Employee
options.helperText: I work for one company at least 30 hours a week and may receive benefits. I probably receive a W2 at tax time.

options.label: Business Owner
options.helperText: I own a business and may have one or more employees.

options.label: Independent Contractor
options.helperText: I work for myself, receive a 1099 tax document, and don’t pay taxes from my paycheck.

options.label: None of these
options.helperText: None of the options describe my employment situation.

questions.label: Do you currently work remotely?
Can you work 100% remotely with your current job?

Is your primary source of income any of these rideshare or delivery apps:
  • Lyft
  • Uber
  • Grubhub
  • DoorDash
  • Shipt
  • Instacart
Is your primary source of income from working full time for a company?

pages.name: 3a.1
pages.heroHtml:
Bummer.

Based on your answers, it looks like you’re not eligible for Tulsa Remote.

We appreciate your time, but you have to be able to work remotely to participate in this program. However, we have other opportunities in Tulsa that we think you might be interested in. Enter your email, and we’ll connect you.

pages.name: 5a.2
pages.heroHtml:
Bummer.

Rideshare services such as Lyft and Uber, and delivery services such as Grubhub, Instacart, and DoorDash, are not considered full-time remote employment. However, we have other opportunities in Tulsa that we think you might be interested in. Enter your email, and we’ll connect you.

pages.name: 6a.1
pages.heroHtml:
Bummer.

Individuals must be at least 18 years of age to apply. However, we have other opportunities in Tulsa that we think you might be interested in. Enter your email, and we’ll connect you.

pages.name: 7a.1
pages.heroHtml:
Bummer.

Individuals outside the U.S. are eligible only if they are legal permanent residents with a green card. However, we have other opportunities in Tulsa that we think you might be interested in. Enter your email, and we’ll connect you.

pages.name: 8a.1
pages.heroHtml:
Bummer.

Applicants must live outside of Oklahoma. However, we have other opportunities in Tulsa that we think you might be interested in. Enter your email, and we’ll connect you.

pages.name: 9a.1
pages.heroHtml:
Bummer.

This program requires income verification to apply. However, we have other opportunities in Tulsa that may be a better fit. Enter your email to learn more.

questions.label: What’s your date of birth?
What’s your citizenship status?
Please list the zip code of your current residence.
ZIP code

Later on in the application process, you’ll need to provide proof of income. Will you you be able to provide one of the following documents?
  • Pay stub
  • Recent tax statement
  • Profit and loss statement
  • Bank statement
This might sound forward, but we can get pretty serious quickly.
If your application is approved, could you commit to relocating to Tulsa for at least one year and having Tulsa as your primary residence during that time?

pages.heroHtml:
Nice!

You meet the eligibility requirements, and we’d love to have you apply!

You meet the eligibility requirements, and we’d love to have you apply!

It takes most folks around 10 - 15 minutes to complete this section.

questions.label: What's your current address?

Have you taken coursework outside of traditional institutions?

E.g. coding boot camp, online courses, or a vocational program
Nice! Can you tell us the name and give a bit of a description of this coursework?

pages.heroHtml:
Tulsa Remoters do it all.

Our community spans industries, organization types, roles, and experience levels.

In the next section, we’ll ask about what you do.

pages.heroHtml:
Thanks for that.

Now, enough about work! What are you like outside of your job?

In this section, we’ll get a sense of your relationship with Tulsa (if any) and how you engage with the community.

questions.label: Describe your moving plans before hearing about Tulsa Remote.

options.value: was planning on moving but not to Tulsa

options.value: was planning on moving to Tulsa

options.value: already bought a house or signed a lease in Tulsa

questions.label: Do you ever lived in Tulsa?
We thought you looked familiar! When did you move away?
Hmm, maybe we know the same people. Do you have friends or family in Tulsa?
In your current community, do you regularly volunteer, or are you a member of any community groups?
Nice! Tell us a little about your volunteering and community activities?
We’d love to know — what do you think makes you a great fit for Tulsa Remote?

We believe that by celebrating remote work, we can attract people from all over the country and dramatically increase Tulsa’s diversity of industries. This diversity of industry and representation ensures that every child born in Tulsa has the opportunity to have a fantastic career, even if they don’t have the means to leave the state to achieve it.

How does that align to your values, passions, or beliefs?

pages.name: section6
pages.heroHtml:
Thank you for applying to Tulsa Remote.

You should get a status update from our team via email within approximately 4 weeks.
